message.content:
cs.DB, cs.AI, cs.DS, cs.LG, cs.IR. 

The paper deals with query evaluation in a peer-to-peer system of taxonomy-based sources, which involves database systems (cs.DB) and artificial intelligence (cs.AI) techniques such as logical models and algorithms. The use of hypergraphs in the centralized algorithm suggests a connection to data structures (cs.DS) and the complexity analysis of the decision problem and query evaluation relates to computational complexity (cs.CC). The paper also discusses optimization issues, which could be relevant to machine learning (cs.LG) and information retrieval (cs.IR).
